Subsection.Text: A municipality or county shall allow a certificateholder to install, construct, and maintain a network within a public right-of-way and shall provide a certificateholder with comparable, nondiscriminatory, and competitively neutral access to the public right-of-way in accordance with the provisions of s. 337.401. All use of a public right-of-way by a certificateholder is nonexclusive.
A municipality or county may not discriminate against a certificateholder regarding:

Paragraph.Text: The authorization or placement of a network in a public right-of-way;
Access to a building or other property; or
Utility pole attachment terms and conditions.
